src.PINNBox.BaseFunctions.func_zeros(X)[source]¶

Return an array of zeros.

Parameters:

X (numpy array) – Coordinates at which zeros are found.

Returns:

Zeros matching number of points in X.

Return type:

numpy array

src.PINNBox.BaseFunctions.addWeights(loss_weights, weights)[source]¶

Adds list of weights to the full list of weights.

Parameters:

  • loss_weights (list) – Current list of weights.

  • weights (list) – List of weights to append.

Returns:

Combined list of weights

Return type:

list
